hooks.command: powershell -Command "$f = $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; if ($f -and ($f -match '\.json$') -and ($f -match 'RainbowAI[\\/]src[\\/]assistant[\\/]data')) { try { Get-Content $f -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json | Out-Null; Write-Output 'JSON valid' } catch { Write-Error \"INVALID JSON in $f - $($_.Exception.Message)\"; exit 1 } }"
